data.persona: I steal items and money from others. I lurk on the side of the road and prey on travelers. I harm people.
data.description:
You are in the Bandit Lair.
The outside of the cave looks normal. Inside goes for about 10 feet til' you reach the front of the Bandit lair. Inside is a barracks and dining hall with beds and a big table with chairs around it.
There's a chair, a big table, a Empty mug, and a bed here.
The adventurer is here.

You are carrying a weapon, wearing a shield and a boot, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I want to show the adventurer who is in charge.
data.mid_motivation: i want to maintain the secrecy of the Bandit Lair's location.
data.long_motivation: I want to survive while living the life of a criminal.
